thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 08 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-IDEXX To Introduce Applied Biocode's Innovative Multiplex Technology Across Global Reference Laboratory Network

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-IDEXX To Introduce Applied Biocode's Innovative Multiplex Technology Across Global Reference Laboratory Network

organizations.name: innovative multiplex technology across global reference laboratory network jan

text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Idexx Laboratories Inc:
* IDEXX TO INTRODUCE APPLIED BIOCODE‘S INNOVATIVE MULTIPLEX TECHNOLOGY ACROSS GLOBAL REFERENCE LABORATORY NETWORK
* IDEXX LABORATORIES - ANTICIPATES APPLIED BIOCODE‘S DIGITAL MULTIPLEX PLATFORM TECHNOLOGY WILL BE COMMERCIALLY AVAILABLE STARTING IN 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
